name: Anshō
description:
Anshō

Anshō is a 3D side scroller being developed in UE 4.26. This game is a submission to the Wowie Jam 3.0: Wowie Jam 3.0 - itch.io

We have used the game jam's topic "FAILURE IS PROGRESS" by implementing a Wraith mode when the player is hit twice, this allows the player to progress the level for 3 seconds, the player is invulnerable, can fly and pass-through walls. Hence, progressing through the level even in failure. The player can take a total of 6 hits after which the player has failed the level.

Currently only Level 1 has been developed, other levels will be released in the near future. Had to rush out this for the submission as the packaging in UE took forever.
